attributes.title: Universal Gamma Scaling: Unified Information-Density Theory (UIDT v3.7.3) - Complete Manuscript (Clean State)
attributes.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è CANONICAL REFERENCE (v3.7.3 - Clean State) - Supersedes all previous versions (v3.6, v3.5.x, v3.3).

ABSTRACT:
UIDT v3.7.3 presents the definitive, non-perturbative framework for the unification of QFT and General Relativity via Information Geometry. This revision integrates the 'Three-Pillar Architecture' (QFT, Cosmology, Lab) and formally synthesizes the framework with the Covariant Scalar-Field (CSF) formalism. It provides a parameter-free derivation of the Yang-Mills mass gap, a 99-step hierarchical suppression mechanism for vacuum energy with œÄ‚Åª¬≤ holographic normalization, and resolves the Hubble Tension via DESI DR2 calibration.

CORE DERIVED CONSTANTS (IMMUTABLE):
This project establishes the following values as the primary source of truth for the UIDT framework:
‚Ä¢ Yang-Mills Mass Gap (Œî): 1.710 ¬± 0.015 GeV
‚Ä¢ Universal Gamma Invariant (Œ≥): 16.339
‚Ä¢ Holographic Length (Œª): 0.66 nm (fixed via DESI)
‚Ä¢ Hubble Constant (H‚ÇÄ): 70.4 km/s/Mpc
‚Ä¢ Vacuum Expectation (v): 47.7 ¬± 0.5 MeV (CORRECTED in v3.7.3)

SCIENTIFIC INTEGRITY & v3.7.3 CORRECTIONS:
Claims are strictly classified (Category A: Proven Theorem to Category D: Unverified Prediction). This version implements three critical corrections:
1. VEV rectified from 0.854 MeV to 47.7 MeV (Symbol Table, Appendix O)
2. Casimir anomaly reclassified from 'confirmed' to 'predicted, unverified (Category D)'
3. H‚ÇÄ value unified to 70.4 km/s/Mpc across all tables and appendices

The RG-derivation of Gamma is explicitly flagged as an Open Question. The holographic normalization factor (œÄ‚Åª¬≤) is now explicitly documented.

CLEAN STATE DECLARATION:
Following the formal withdrawal of v3.3 due to external formatting errors, v3.7.3 establishes the permanent, verified canonical state. All external interference has been removed, and this version represents the definitive implementation under full personal control.

--------------------------------------------------
